statements: SELECT user_id, item_id, rating, timestamp FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, rating FROM recommendations WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM recommendations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM recommendations WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recommendations;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, item_id, rating FROM recommendations WHERE item_id = 100 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT item_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM recommendations GROUP BY item_id HAVING avg_rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT item_id) AS num_items FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM recommendations WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 'c81291b3-00a8-4c81-aa94-9f5ccea06726';
SELECT user_id FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_text LIKE '%great%' AND user_id = 'd2070892-e3ec-48c1-9012-7d00b1a2b893';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id WHERE user_name = 'John Doe' AND recommendation_text LIKE '%great%';

SELECT user_name, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM users LEFT JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id GROUP BY user_name HAVING num_recommendations > 3 ORDER BY num_recommendations DESC;

SELECT u.user_name, r.recommendation_text FROM users u INNER JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.recommendation_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY u.user_name ASC, r.recommendation_text DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT user_id, product_id, score FROM recommendations WHERE score >= 5 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_name, price FROM recommendations JOIN products ON recommendations.product_id = products.product_id WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.0 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT username, recommendations.score, product_name FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.id = recommendations.user_id JOIN products ON products.product_id = recommendations.product_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'A%';

SELECT users.username, recommendations.score, products.product_name FROM users, recommendations, products WHERE users.id = recommendations.user_id AND recommendations.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT user_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_score > 3 ORDER BY avg_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, product_id, relevance_score FROM recommendations WHERE relevance_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender='Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, quantity FROM purchase_history WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND quantity > 1;
SELECT user_id, product_id, relevance_score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND recommendation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY relevance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM items WHERE price > 100;
SELECT user_id, item_id, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM items JOIN ratings ON items.item_id = ratings.item_id GROUP BY item_name;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM items ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT u.username, i.item_name, p.purchase_date FROM users u JOIN purchases p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN items i ON p.item_id = i.item_id WHERE u.age < 30
SELECT r.rating, i.item_name, u.username FROM ratings r JOIN items i ON r.item_id = i.item_id JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY r.rating DESC
